name: discovering-worlds-love2d
description: Trying to implement world generation as described at https://undiscoveredworlds.blogspot.com/2019/02/basic-continents.html

scripts.build: mkdir -p release && npx love.js --compatibility --title "Discovering Worlds" src release
scripts.zip: rm -f discovering-worlds.zip; pushd release; zip -9 -r ../discovering-worlds.zip *; popd
scripts.love: rm -f discovering-worlds.love; pushd src; zip -9 -r ../discovering-worlds.love *; popd

author: JimOfLeisure
